name: No Man's Bush Video Game
description:
The game is based on a short animated film 🎥 No Man's Bush that was shown around the world 🌎. 

Six years after its release, it has been translated to a game while maintaining the same unique art style; hand-drawn animation on paper with ink and markers.

Get lost in the absurd universe and find your goal. 🦵

🎳 Free to play. If you like it consider to share it with your friends. 

Donation is appreciated. The money will be used for development of future games.

Controls:
Keyboard or Xbox360 controller
